evyan.whitney: hey! wanted to give a few updates about the #sensualselfiechallenge:  1. If you joined the challenge on or after 9/5, you will not receive the prompts that were published before you joined. That’s because the challenge is live and I am unable to resend . You will receive the next prompts bright and early tomorrow morning—around 3:00am PST.  2. If you want to do the prompts you missed, please look through our hashtag: #sensualselfiechallenge. There are clues about what the prompts are in people’s captions.  3. This challenge has grown much bigger than I intended/imagined; there are literally 2,500+ of you taking it right now—which is incredible but also very overwhelming for a highly sensitive empath like me. During the last challenge, I was able to view and like/comment on almost every post. This time that would be next to impossible. But know that even if I’m not commenting/liking, I am seeing every single photo you are putting out and doing my best not to cry my eyes out because you’re so beautiful. 4. Lastly, I just want to mention that there’s no team helping me manage this challenge—no assistants or customer service folks or even interns. It’s just me and my little laptop. I mention this so that you know understand how challenging it is for me to respond to each message and question right now, specifically because I have other work/projects that needs my attention—my clients specifically. So if you’ve got a question, please be patient with me as it might take a moment before I respond. And if you do have a question, please don’t DM me, send me an email (link in bio). I love you. Thank you for helping me practice healthy boundaries that are gonna help keep me sane over the next five days.
